verses.verse: 'Now in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall also <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%> It will be to you a <S%H3117>day<s%> for <S%H8643>blowing<s%> <S%H8643>trumpets.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%><S%H1121>,<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> [and] <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%>

also their grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> three-tenths [of an ephah] for the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> two-tenths for the <S%H352>ram,<s%>
and one-tenth for <S%H259>each<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs.<s%>
'And [offer] <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you,

<S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> of the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon,<s%> and its grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and its grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations,<s%> according to their <S%H4941>ordinance,<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation,<s%> and you shall <S%H6031>humble<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves;<s%> you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [as] a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%><S%H1121>,<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H1961>having<s%> them <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%>

and their grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> three-tenths [of an] [ephah] for the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> two-tenths for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%>
a <S%H6241>tenth<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs;<s%>

<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%> and the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and its grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> and you shall <S%H2287>observe<s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%><S%H1121>,<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> which are <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect,<s%>

and their grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> three-tenths [of an ephah] for <S%H259>each<s%> of the <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two-tenths<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> of the two <S%H352>rams,<s%>
and a <S%H6241>tenth<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> of the <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3532>lambs;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> its grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and its <S%H5262>libation.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%><S%H1121>,<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%>

and their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> by their <S%H4557>number<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and its grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%>

and their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> by their <S%H4557>number<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and its grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and its <S%H5262>libation.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%>

their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> by their <S%H4557>number<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> its grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and its <S%H5262>libation.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%>

and their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> by their <S%H4557>number<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and its grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and its <S%H5262>libation.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%>

and their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> by their <S%H4557>number<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> its grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and its <S%H5262>libations.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%>

and their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations<s%> for the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> for the <S%H352>rams<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> by their <S%H4557>number<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> its grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and its <S%H5262>libation.<s%>

'On the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6116>solemn<s%> <S%H6116>assembly;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

'But you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%>

their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations<s%> for the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> for the <S%H352>ram<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> by their <S%H4557>number<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance;<s%>

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and its grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and its <S%H5262>libation.<s%>

'You shall <S%H6213>present<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at your <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>times,<s%> <S%H905>besides<s%> <S%H4480><s%> your <S%H5088>votive<s%> <S%H5088>offerings<s%> and your <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> for your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and for your grain <S%H4503>offerings<s%> and for your <S%H5262>libations<s%> and for your <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>' "
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in accordance with <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
